update uploadfile
fileName = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fileUrl = #{fileurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update uploadfile set fileName = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fileUrl = #{fileurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fileUrlManage = #{fileurlmanage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uploadTime = #{uploadtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, uploadUser = #{uploaduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fileType = #{filetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fileStatus = #{filestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, relateTable = #{relatetable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, relateId = #{relateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id, fileName, fileUrl, fileUrlManage, uploadTime, uploadUser, fileType, fileStatus, relateTable, relateId FROM uploadfile ORDER BY uploadTime DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
